Text: Just the standard chapterizing of a rip I found.
Thanks a lot! good downloading speed, and an interesting piece to hear today.
96kb bit rate... HOW OLD IS YOUR MP3 PLAYER?

@Mercury8215

Like I said, not my rip. I think you'll find that most audiobooks are not encoded at 320kbps. It is just voice, after all.
I know it's not you're fault, but nothing should be encoded lower then 128.  Otherwise you get that nice ear splitting metallic background noise.
Mercury - you won't be able to tell the difference between 96kbps and 128kbps for voice. Try it yourself in a double-blind test if you don't believe me.

Great quality, very funny book.

Thanks man.
I can't believe this has been out for six months and there hasn't been a PDF release of the book.
